title: Medievil 1 [PAL] PSX
description:
Medievil 1 for PSX.

This is a working image of Medievil 1 for the Playstation. It is copied straight from the original disk. 

Medievil is one of the first games that included LibCrypt, an anti copy protection produced by Sony back in the day. Therefor, most of the isos that you will find on the internet, stop working after you finish level 3 (Cemetery Hill).

You can use any emulator to run the game.

If you want to burn the image onto a CD and put it in the original console, here is what you should do:

Download and install a burning program called "Clone CD" (it's not for free so you can just use the 3 week trial) and burn the image to a CD of your choice. It's pretty easy to do it because from all 4 files that is included in the torrent folder, Clone CD can select only one of them so it is very obvious.

This is the only program to burn a working CD for console play, because it makes an exact copy 1:1 of the game. Do not try it with any other burning software or it ill fail after level 3.

Enjoy
Thanks
